#summary sum(property[where,include,distinct])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelClassFunctions Model Class Functions]

*Description*:

Calculates the sum of values for a given property. Uses the SQL function SUM.

*Return Type*:

Numeric

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *property* || string || true || - || Name of the property to get the sum for ||
|| *where* || string || false ||   || A SQL fragment such as lastName LIKE 'A%' for example ||
|| *include* || string || false ||   || Any associations that needs to be included in the query ||
|| *distinct* || boolean || false || false || When true, SUM returns the sum of unique values only ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset allSalaries = model("employee").sum(property="salary")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset allAustralianSalaries = model("employee").sum(property="salary", include="country", where="name='Australia'")>
}}}
